item.title: 2017 Jun 6th Reading Ref
item.description:
esther

New topic to study: Scrum
Highlight: What is the Future of Front End Web Development? - User expectations on the rise. - New JavaScript is here. - We’re not building pages, we’re building systems. - The line between native and web is blurring. - URLs are still a killer feature. - Performance is a key player. - CSS will get much more modular. - CSS preprocessing will slowly fade away. - Being good at HTML and CSS remains vital. - Build processes will get competitive.
